task_description: 生成带有'HOO XIANG'品牌标识的堂食3D ICON图 - 中餐米线店就餐场景，Pixar卡通风格

input_data.text_prompt: A cute 3D Pixar-style cartoon icon of a Chinese noodle restaurant dining scene. Main elements: A white ceramic bowl filled with steaming golden rice noodles in rich broth (color #FFD700), chopsticks (bamboo texture #D2B48C) placed across the bowl edge, miniature condiment bottles set (red chili oil bottle #DC143C, dark brown vinegar bottle #654321, soy sauce bottle) arranged beside the bowl, all placed on a rich red-wood dining table (colors #8B4513, #A0522D) with visible wood grain texture. BRAND IDENTITY: A small elegant table sign at the table corner prominently displaying 'HOO XIANG' in clear blue text (#2B4A7C) on white/cream background (#FFFFFF), designed as a refined standing sign or round identification plate, occupying 10-15% of the icon area, positioned at front or side of table without blocking main elements. Scene captured from 3/4 overhead view showing complete dining setup and brand sign. Steam wisps rising from hot noodles. Textures: glossy ceramic bowl with highlights, natural bamboo chopsticks, smooth wood table grain, plastic/acrylic brand sign material. Lighting: dual light sources from top and 45-degree front creating soft shadows. Pure white or transparent background. Pixar 3D cartoon aesthetic with warm, authentic, brand-focused atmosphere. Commercial quality rendering. 1024x1024px square format.
input_data.negative_prompt: blurry brand name, unreadable text, 2D flat design, realistic photography, dark atmosphere, cluttered composition, unclear brand sign, messy background

metadata.notes: 带有HOO XIANG品牌标识的堂食场景3D图标，Pixar卡通风格，品牌桌牌清晰可见
